de.tub.ise.ec.clients

Interface ICrud

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Client

    public interface ICrud
    Specifies generic interface of a CRUD client. Each of the methods generates a Hermes Request to send.
    Author:
    Jacek Janczura

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      de.tub.ise.hermes.Request asyncWrite(java.lang.String key, java.io.Serializable value)
      This method triggers asynchronous replication on a write request.

      This message deletes the file local on the server which reveived the message.

      Reads value under the key.

      This method triggers synchronous replication on a write request.

      • asyncWrite

        de.tub.ise.hermes.Request asyncWrite(java.lang.String key,
                                     java.io.Serializable value)
        This method triggers asynchronous replication on a write request. All replicas will be asynchronously replicated.
        Parameters:
        key - Key in a KV store
        value - Value which will be written in for a key
        Returns:
        ready request to send to the server

      • syncWrite

        de.tub.ise.hermes.Request syncWrite(java.lang.String key,
                                    java.io.Serializable value)
        This method triggers synchronous replication on a write request. All replicas will be synchronously replicated.
        Parameters:
        key - Key in a KV store
        value - Value which will be written in for a key
        Returns:
        ready request to send to the server
